title: Data Engineering & Cloud Platforms
description: Experience with Google Cloud Platform (BigQuery, Cloud Storage, Cloud Functions, Cloud Run) and migrating data infrastructure from on-premise to cloud. Built automated data pipelines for ingestion, transformation, and validation, and designed a three-tiered data warehousing architecture (live, staging, storage).

title: Data Science & Machine Learning
description: Developed forecasting models using Vertex AI and built Media ROI and Marketing Mix Models to evaluate marketing effectiveness. Applied optimization techniques and linear programming for strategic decision-making.

title: Development & Automation
description: Built backend APIs using Flask and REST, and developed automated document processing solutions with Document AI for vendor PO parsing. Created chatbots using Gemini API and Streamlit, automated reporting with PowerPoint, Excel, and Python, and built interactive business intelligence apps with Streamlit.
